card.name: Lockdown
card.text: Enchant artifact or creature Enchanted permanent can’t attack or block and its activated abilities can’t be activated.

card.name: Bantha Herd
card.text: XXW: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When this creature becomes monstrous, create twice X 1/1 white Tusken creature tokens named Tusken Raider.

card.name: The Battle of Hoth
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When The Battle of Hoth enters, create a 1/1 white Rebel creature token and a 1/1 white Trooper creature token. --- (Back): Echo Base

card.name: Echo Base
card.text: 2W, {T}: Create a token copy of target token creature you control that didn’t enter this turn. --- (Front): The Battle of Hoth

card.name: Battle Tactics
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Cantina Band
card.text: {1}, {T}: Tap target nonartifact creature.

card.name: Condemn
card.text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner’s library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Deploy The Troops
card.text: Create three 1/1 white Trooper creature tokens.

card.name: Droideka
card.text: 2U: Put a shield counter on this creature if it doesn’t have one. Activate only once each turn and only if no counters were removed from this creature this turn. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.) Repair 3 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Escape Pod
card.text: Exile target creature you control. Return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Force Healing
card.text: Choose a color. You and up to one target creature you control gain hexproof from that color until end of turn. Scry 1.

card.name: Hello There
card.text: Untap target creature you control. Choose one— • That creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. • When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, you gain 5 life. • Draw a card.

card.name: Gifted Initiate
card.text: When this creature enters, you may tap up to one target creature. If you do, tap this creature. Meditate 2W (2W: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Gonk Droid
card.text: When this creature leaves the battlefield, draw a card. Repair 4 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with four time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Jedi Battle Healer
card.text: Lifelink When this creature enters, you gain 2 life. Meditate 1W (1W: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Jedi Instructor
card.text: When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature. Meditate 1W (1W: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Jedi Starfighter
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Whenever a creature that crewed this Vehicle this turn leaves the battlefield, this Vehicle gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Crew 1

card.name: LAAT Gunship
card.text: Whenever this Vehicle attacks, choose one— • Create a 1/1 white Trooper creature token. • This Vehicle gains spaceflight until end of turn. (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Crew 1

card.name: Lando Calrissian
card.text: Lando Calrissian has first strike as long as he’s attacking. At the beginning of combat on your turn, target Vehicle creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Loyal Tauntaun
card.text: 1G: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) When this creature becomes monstrous, it gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Maintenance Hangar
card.text: If one or more time counters would be removed from a card you own in exile, you may remove that many plus one instead. Vehicles you control have repair 6. When a Vehicle card is exiled this way, it gains repair for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: Miraculous Recovery
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Nebulon-B Frigate
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) When this Vehicle enters, creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn. Crew 1

card.name: Orbital Bombardment
card.text: Destroy all creatures and Vehicles without spaceflight.

card.name: Plo Koon
card.text: Flash You may activate meditate abilities any time you could cast an instant. Meditate 1W (1W: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Riding Ronto
card.text: Vigilance 3W: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

card.name: Sand Trooper
card.text: Vigilance Whenever one or more Troopers you control attack, scry 1.

card.name: Security Droid
card.text: When this creature enters, create a 1/1 colorless Droid artifact creature token. Repair 3 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Snow Trooper
card.text: Whenever one or more Troopers you control attack, for each defending player, tap up to one target creature that player controls. (The protector of an attacked permanent is also a defending player.)

card.name: Womp Rat
card.text: 1W: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) When this creature becomes monstrous, it gains lifelink and vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: X-Wing
card.text: Vigilance Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Crew 1

card.name: Admiral Ackbar
card.text: When you cast Admiral Ackbar, create two B-Wings, they’re kindred 2/2 blue Rebel Vehicle artifact tokens with spaceflight and crew 1. At the beginning of each upkeep, untap each Vehicle you control. Whenever two or more Vehicles you control attack, draw a card.

card.name: Armed Protocol Droid
card.text: Flash Sacrifice this creature: You may cast artifact spells as though they had flash this turn. Repair 3 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: The Battle of Naboo
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When The Battle of Naboo enters, return up to X target creatures to their owners’ hands. Draw twice X cards. --- (Back): Peace Accord

card.name: Peace Accord
card.text: Creatures you control have ward {2}. Creatures can’t attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that’s attacking you. --- (Front): The Battle of Naboo

card.name: Cloaking Device
card.text: Flash Enchant creature or Vehicle When Cloaking Device enters, enchanted permanent gains hexproof until end of turn. Enchanted creature can’t be blocked. Whenever enchanted creature attacks, defending player loses 1 life. (The protector of an attacked permanent is also a defending player.)

card.name: Force Denial
card.text: Hate — Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. If an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, counter that spell instead. Scry 1.

card.name: Force Push
card.text: Target artifact or creatures owner shuffles it into their library. Scry 2.

card.name: Gungan Captain
card.text: Vigilance Whenever this creature deals damage to a creature, put a stun counter on that creature and tap it.

card.name: Jar Jar Binks
card.text: Jar Jar Binks can’t block. When Jar Jar Binks enters, target player other than its owner gains control of it. At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose a creature you control with the greatest power among untapped creatures you control. Tap that creature.

card.name: Jedi Battle Mage
card.text: When this creature enters, put a stun counter on up to one target creature an opponent controls. Tap that creature. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.) Meditate 1U (1U: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Jedi Mind Trick
card.text: You control target player during their next turn.

card.name: Jedi Training
card.text: Meditate abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate. This effect can’t reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana. Whenever a Jedi creature you control leaves the battlefield without dying, scry 1.

card.name: Shore Trooper
card.text: Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) Other Troopers you control have ward {2}.

card.name: Mace Windu
card.text: Flash When Mace Windu enters, return target spell or creature you don’t control to its owner’s hand. Meditate 1U (1U: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Mon Calamari Cruiser
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Whenever this Vehicle deals combat damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent protects, you may draw a card. (Players protect permanents that can be attacked.) Crew 2

card.name: Mon Calamari Initiate
card.text: Flash When this creature enters, draw a card. Meditate {2} ({2}: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Ortolan Keyboardist
card.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Personal Energy Shield
card.text: Counter target spell that targets you or a permanent you control.

card.name: Ponder
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle. Draw a card.

card.name: Probe Droid
card.text: When this creature enters, target player reveals their hand. Repair 4 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with four time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Republic Frigate
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Whenever a Trooper creature you control enters, untap this Vehicle. Crew 1

card.name: Rumination
card.text: Draw three cards, then put a card from your hand on top of your library.

card.name: Shadow Trooper
card.text: Flash You may cast Trooper spells as though they had flash.

card.name: Sith Manipulator
card.text: Hate — When this creature enters, return target artifact or creature to its owner’s hand. If an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, that creature’s owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library instead.

card.name: Sith Sorcerer
card.text: When this creature enters, scry 2. Hate — When this creature dies, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Super Battle Droid
card.text: Repair 2 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with two time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: It's a Trap!
card.text: Untap up to one target nonland permanent you control. You may have one of those permanents that’s a Vehicle, becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Spider Droid
card.text: Repair 5 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with five time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.) Whenever one or more nontoken creatures you control leave the battlefield while this card is in exile, you may remove up to that many time counters from this card in exile.

card.name: Vapor Snag
card.text: Return target creature to its owner’s hand. Its controller loses 1 life.

card.name: Y-Wing
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Whenever this Vehicle deals combat damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent protects, you may pay {1}. If you do, put a stun counter on target creature defending player controls. Tap that creature. (Players protect permanents that can be attacked. The protector of an attacked permanent is also a defending player.) Crew 1

card.name: Zam Wesell
card.text: When you cast Zam Wesell, target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a creature card from it and have Zam Wesell enter as a copy of that creature card. If you don’t, draw a card.

card.name: Acquire Target
card.text: You may put a bounty counter on up to one target permanent. If you don’t, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.) Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

card.name: Aqualish Bounty Hunter
card.text: When this creature enters, put a bounty counter on target permanent. Whenever you complete a bounty, target player discards a card. (You complete a bounty when a permanent you don’t control with a bounty counter is put into a graveyard from the battlefield.)

card.name: The Battle of Yavin
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When The Battle of Yavin enters, for each nonland permanent you don’t control, its controller sacrifices it unless they pay X life. --- (Back): Trench Run

card.name: Trench Run
card.text: Each opponent sacrifices a legendary permanent. Each opponent that can’t sacrifices a creature instead. --- (Front): The Battle of Yavin

card.name: Bib Fortuna
card.text: When Bib Fortuna enters, search your library for a card, then shuffle, then put that card on top of it. You lose 1 life. When Bib Fortuna dies, shuffle your library.

card.name: Black Market Dealer
card.text: Whenever an outlaw creature you control dies, put a bounty counter on target permanent. (Assassins, Mercenaries, Pirates, Rogues, and Warlocks are outlaws.) Whenever you complete a bounty, you lose 1 life and draw a card. (You complete a bounty when a permanent you don’t control with a bounty counter is put into a graveyard from the battlefield.)

card.name: Bounty Spotter
card.text: This creature doesn’t untap during your untap step. {T}: Put a bounty counter on target creature or Vehicle. Whenever you complete a bounty, untap this creature. (You complete a bounty when a permanent you don’t control with a bounty counter is put into a graveyard from the battlefield.)

card.name: Death Trooper
card.text: Deathtouch 2B: Target Trooper you control gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Doom Blade
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Droid Commando
card.text: When this creature dies, choose one— • Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. • Remove two counters from target permanent an opponent protects. You gain 2 life. (Players protect permanents that can be attacked.) Repair 3 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Force Drain
card.text: Force Drain deals 2 damage to any nonplayer target. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) Hate — Then if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Grand Moff Tarkin
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent’s upkeep, choose target creature that player controls. That player may discard a card or pay 2 life. If they don’t, destroy the chosen creature.

card.name: Hazard Trooper
card.text: Menace When this creature enters, up to one target creature gets -1/-1 for each Trooper you control until end of turn.

card.name: Head Hunting
card.text: Put a bounty counter on up to one target permanent. Each opponent loses 1 life. Draw a card.

card.name: Heavy Trooper
card.text: Whenever one or more Troopers you control attack, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain 1 life.

card.name: IG-88B
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever IG-88B deals combat damage to an opponent or a permanent they protect, that player loses life equal to the number of bounty counters among permanents they control. (Players protect permanents that can be attacked.) Repair 3

card.name: Interrogation
card.text: Target player discards a card. Then that player discards another card unless they pay 3 life.

card.name: Neophyte Hateflayer
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Open Season
card.text: When this enchantment enters, put a bounty counter on target permanent. Activated abilities of nonland permanents your opponents control with a bounty counter can’t be activated. Whenever you complete a bounty, each opponent loses 2 life. You gain 2 life. (You complete a bounty when a permanent you don’t control with a bounty counter is put into a graveyard from the battlefield.)

card.name: Order 66
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature with a bounty counter your opponents control. Put a bounty counter on each creature you don’t control, then destroy all creatures you don’t control.

card.name: Repurpose
card.text: Destroy target creature or Vehicle. Return up to one target creature or Vehicle card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Rule of Two
card.text: As long as you control exactly two creatures, those creatures have deathtouch and lifelink.

card.name: Sith Assassin
card.text: Hate — When this creature enters, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, destroy up to one target nonblack creature.

card.name: Sith Evoker
card.text: Lifelink Hate — When this creature enters, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, return target creature or planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Sith Inquisitor
card.text: Hate — When this creature enters, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, each opponent discards a card at random.

card.name: Sith Lord
card.text: Menace This creature enters with X +1/+1 counters, where X is the total amount of life lost by your opponents this turn.

card.name: Sith Thoughtseeker
card.text: Hate — 1U: Draw a card. Activate only if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn and only once each turn.

card.name: Swarm the Skies
card.text: Create a 1/1 white Trooper creature token and a 2/1 black Vehicle artifact token with spaceflight and crew 1 named TIE Fighter.

(Players protect permanents that can be attacked. The protector of an attacked permanent is also a defending player.) Crew 1

card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Whenever this Vehicle attacks, each opponent loses 2 life. Crew 1

card.text: When this creature enters, put a bounty counter on target creature an opponent controls. 3R: This creature deals 2 damage to target creature with a bounty counter.

card.name: A-Wing
card.text: Flash This Vehicle can’t block Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) card.name: Capture
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. At the beginning of the next upkeep, if that creature has a bounty counter, its controller sacrifices it.

card.name: Crossfire
card.text: Crossfire deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature’s controller.

card.name: Dark Apprenticeship
card.text: Hate — At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, Dark Apprenticeship deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Force Lightning
card.text: Choose two— • Force Lightning deals X damage to target player. • Force Lightning deals twice X damage to any nonplayer target. • Scry 1 up to X times.

card.name: Force Spark
card.text: Force Spark deals 2 damage divided among up to two targets. Scry 1.

card.text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls enters, if this creature is untapped, it fights that creature.

card.name: Geonosian Warrior
card.text: Haste 2R: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When this creature becomes monstrous, it gains menace until end of turn.

card.text: Han Solo has first strike as long as he’s attacking. At the beginning of combat on your turn, target Vehicle creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Imperial Gunner

card.name: Jango Fett
card.text: Menace, haste Whenever Jango Fett attacks a player, put a bounty counter on up to one target creature they control. Whenever Jango Fett attacks, he gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each creature defending player controls with a bounty counter.

card.text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Rallying Fire
card.text: Rallying Fire deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of creatures you control plus 2.

card.name: Shoot First
card.text: Target creature you control gains first strike until end of turn. That creature deals damage equal to its power to any nonplayer target.

card.name: Rocket Trooper
card.text: Whenever this creature or another Trooper you control enters, you may have this creature deal 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Shock Trooper
card.text: Attacking Troopers you control get +1/+0.

card.name: Sith Marauder
card.text: Hate — When this creature enters, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, this creature deals 3 damage to any target.

card.text: Deathtouch Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn’t monstrous, it becomes monstrous. XXG: This creature gets +X/+X until end of turn. Activate only if this creature is monstrous.

card.name: Nightspider
card.text: Deathtouch 4G: Monstrosity 2. Activate only if a creature died this turn. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

card.name: No Contest
card.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control. Excess damage the creature you control would deal is dealt to the other creature’s controller instead.

card.name: Rancor
card.text: Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample. When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner’s hand.

card.name: Regression
card.text: The owner of target artifact, battle, or enchantment shuffles it into their library and gains life equal to its mana value.

card.name: Scout the Perimeter
card.text: When Scout the Perimeter enters, draw a card and put a bounty counter on up to one target permanent. Whenever you complete a bounty, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. This ability triggers only once each turn. (You complete a bounty when a permanent you don’t control with a bounty counter is put into a graveyard from the battlefield.)

card.name: Scout Trooper
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. Other Troopers you control have “{T}: Add {C}.”

card.name: Shaak Herd
card.text: 1G: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) Whenever this creature dies, you may put any of its counters on target creature you control.

card.name: Show of Dominance
card.text: Put three +1/+1 counters on the creature with the highest power. If two or more creatures are tied for the greatest power, you choose one of them. That creature gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Trooper Commando
card.text: Trample Whenever one or more Trooper creatures you control attack, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Wookiee Bounty Hunter
card.text: Whenever you complete a bounty, you gain 3 life. (You complete a bounty when a permanent you don’t control with a bounty counter is put into a graveyard from the battlefield.)

card.name: AAT-1
card.text: Whenever you remove one or more time counters from a card you own in exile, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Repair 4 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with four time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.) Crew 1

card.name: Acklay of the Arena
card.text: 2RGW: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) Whenever a creature you control becomes monstrous, that creature fights target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Adroit Hateflayer
card.text: Menace (This creature can’t be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Whenever this creature attacks, each player loses 2 life.

card.name: Anakin Skywalker
card.text: Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Anakin Skywalker. Sacrifice another creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery. If Anakin Skywalker would die, instead remove all damage from him, remove him from combat, transform him. --- (Back): Darth Vader

card.name: Darth Vader
card.text: Lifelink, menace Whenever Darth Vader attacks, creatures defending player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn for each +1/+1 counter on Darth Vader. (The protector of an attacked permanent is also a defending player.) --- (Front): Anakin Skywalker

card.name: Asajj Ventress
card.text: Double strike When a creature blocks Asajj Ventress, she gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Hate — Whenever Asajj Ventress attacks, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, up to one target creature blocks this turn if able.

card.name: Aurra Sing, Bane of Jedi
card.text: [+1]: Put a bounty counter on target creature, battle, or planeswalker. Aurra Sing, Bane of Jedi deals 2 damage to that permanent and 1 damage to you. [-X]: Return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until end of turn. [-5]: Target opponent gets an emblem with “Whenever a nontoken creature you control leaves the battlefield, discard a card.”

card.name: Blind Worship
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is enchanted creature’s power.

card.name: Boba Fett
card.text: Menace, deathtouch, haste When Boba Fett enters, put a bounty counter on up to one target nonland permanent an opponent controls. Whenever you complete a bounty, you may draw two cards. If you do, discard two cards.

card.name: Bull Rancor
card.text: Trample 1RGW: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) Whenever a creature you control becomes monstrous, that creature gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: C-3PO and R2D2
card.text: When C-3PO and R2D2 leaves the battlefield, you gain 4 life and draw a card. Repair 3 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Carbonite Chamber
card.text: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. It can’t attack or block, its activated abilities can’t be activated, and it’s an artifact in addition to its other types.

card.name: Chewbacca
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Chewbacca attacks alone, monstrosity 1. Whenever Chewbacca or another creature you control becomes monstrous, that creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Chief Chirpa
card.text: 2RGW: Monstrosity 2. Whenever a green creature you control dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on another target Ewok Rebel creature you control. When one or more +1/+1 counters are placed on Chief Chirpa, create that many 1/1 green Ewok Rebel creature tokens.

card.name: Commander Cody
card.text: Whenever one or more nontoken Troopers you control attack, create that many 1/1 white Trooper creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.

card.name: Cruelty of the Sith
card.text: Choose one — • Counter target noncreature spell. • Target player sacrifices a creature. • Cruelty of the Sith deals 3 damage to target player or target permanent an opponent protects. That player or that permanents protector discards a card. (Players protect permanents that can be attacked.)

card.name: Cunning Abduction
card.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. Exile a nonland card revealed this way. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

card.name: Dagobah Maw Slug
card.text: 2RGW: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) As long as this creature is monstrous, it has menace.

card.name: Dark Decision
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay 1 life. Look at the top ten cards of your library. Exile a card from among them, then shuffle. You may play that card this turn.

card.name: Darth Maul
card.text: Double strike, haste Hate — Whenever Darth Maul attacks, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, up to one target creature can’t block Darth Maul this turn.

card.name: Darth Sidious, Sith Lord
card.text: [+2]: Darth Sidious, Sith Lord deals 3 damage to any target. [-3]: Gain control of target creature. [-9]: You get an emblem with “If a source you control would deal noncombat damage, it deals that much damage plus 3 instead.”

card.name: Darth Tyranus, Count Dooku
card.text: [+1]: Until your next turn, whenever a creature attacks you or a permanent you protect, that creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn. [0]: Draw a card. Each player loses 1 life. [-4]: You may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, search your library for an artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Ferocity of the Underworld
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target nonland permanent. • Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. • Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Force Choke
card.text: Counter target spell. When a spell is countered this way, its owner may pay life equal to that spell’s mana value. If they do, they return that card from their graveyard to their hand. Scry 2.

card.name: Force Mastery
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You gain life equal to its mana value.

card.name: Greedo
card.text: Creatures blocking or blocked by Greedo have first strike. When Greedo dies, you may search your library for an outlaw card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. (Assassins, Mercenaries, Pirates, Rogues, and Warlocks are outlaws.)

card.name: Hot Pursuit
card.text: When this enchantment enters, put a bounty counter on up to one target permanent. Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 for each bounty counter on them. Whenever you complete a bounty, put a bounty counter on up to one target creature.

card.name: Hunt to Extinction
card.text: Put a bounty counter on each of up to two target nonland permanents. Hunt to Extinction deals X damage to target opponent and each creature they control. Hunt to Extinction deals an additional X damage to each of those creatures with a bounty counter.

card.text: Menace Whenever this Vehicle attacks, defending player loses 2 life for each creature that crewed this Vehicle this turn. Crew 1 --- (Front): The Battle of Utapau

card.name: Dengar
card.text: When Dengar enters, put a bounty counter on target permanent. Whenever you complete a bounty, return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand unless an opponent pays 3 life. (You complete a bounty when a permanent you don’t control with a bounty counter is put into a graveyard from the battlefield.)

card.name: The Tomb of Miktrull
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color an artifact you control could produce.

card.name: Jump to Hyperspace
card.text: Choose one. If you’ve cast another spell this turn, choose both instead. • Attacking creatures you don’t control get -1/-0 for each Vehicle you control until end of turn. • Return up to one target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
